name: UILexiconEntry
desc: A read-only term pair, available within a lexicon object, for a custom keyboard.

items.name: var documentText: String
items.desc: Text to be inserted into a text input object by a custom keyboard, corresponding to the userInput value in the same lexicon entry.

items.name: var userInput: String
items.desc: Text to match, during user input, to provide appropriate output to a text document from the documentText value in the same lexicon entry.
